amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt any rule or set of rules prescribed by the Secretary of Education and relating to consumer protections for student loan borrowers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 115-20 to exempt any rule or set of rules prescribed by the Secretary of Education and relating to consumer protections for student loan borrowers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 235 (Roll no. 109).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 235 (Roll no. 109).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
